definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pick or gather up, specif. glean ( NH id. and [[נׇקַט]]; Ar. laqat.a pick up (as a bird, grains, etc.); Aram. [[לְקַט]], and [[נְקַט]]; lqot.; Mand. [[לגט]] (Nö:M 54, also on Talm. [[נקט]]); cf. As. lakâtu Dl:HWB 385 (but [[ט]] = t?)) ;—

pick up, gather, c. acc., stones Ge 31:46 (J), lilies Ct So 6:2; usu. the manna: Ex 16:4, Ex 16:5, Ex 16:26 (J), v:Ex 16:21, v:Ex 16:22 (P); sq. [[מִן]] partit. v:Ex 16:16 (P); so abs. v:Ex 16:27, Nu 11:8 ( both JE ), Ex 16:17, Ex 16:18 (P); of animals gathering food [[תִּתֵּן לָהֶם יִלְקׂטָוּן]] Ps 104:28.
specif. glean, abs., Ru 2:8 (c. [[בְּ]] loc.; usu. Pi. in this sense ).
gather, gather up, fallen grapes, Le 19:10 (H), arrows 1Sa 20:38, (fire-)wood Je 7:18; abs. (food from ground) Ju Jdg 1:7 (cf. GFM); = pick, pick off, 2Ki 4:39, 2Ki 4:39 (+ [[מִן]] of source ).

specif. glean, after the reapers, usu. abs. Ru 2:3, Ru 2:7 (‖[[אָסַף]]), v:Ru 2:17 ( all c. [[בְּ]] loc.), v:Ru 2:15 ( [[בֵּין]] loc.), v:Ru 2:19 (adv. loc.), also v:Ru 2:2 (where [[בְּ]] may be loc. or partit., cf. Be), also v:Ru 2:15, v:Ru 2:16, v:Ru 2:23; c. acc. Is 17:5 ([[שִׁבֳּלִים]], sim. of devastation of land; ‖[[אָסַף קָחִיר]]), Ru 2:17, Ru 2:18; c. acc. cogn. [[לֶקֶט]] Le 19:9 = Le 23:22 (H).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[תְּלֻקְּטוּ]] Is 27:12 ye shall be picked up (of Isr. under fig. of grains or berries, after the threshing process of ´[[י]]'s judgment).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּתְלַקְּטוּ]] Ju Jdg 11:3 and there collected themselves worthless men unto ([[אֶל]]) Jephthah (were raked together GFM).
